sub_topic: Probability of a certain stock price change
message_1: A stock price for Company ABC is currently at $50 per share. In the next month, there is a 70% chance that the stock price will increase by $10 per share and a 30% chance that the stock price will decrease by $5 per share. What is the probability that the stock price for Company ABC will be at least $60 per share at the end of the month?
message_2: Since the stock price is currently at $50 per share, in order for it to be at least $60 per share at the end of the month, it needs to increase by $10 per share. According to the given information, there is a 70% chance that the stock price will increase by $10 per share. Therefore, the probability that the stock price for Company ABC will be at least $60 per share at the end of the month is 70%.
